attributes.action: reject the "abstract" 2012 Olympic Games brand and replace it with the previous design incorporating the River Thames.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A new logo has been unveiled today (4th June 2007) for the London 2012 Olympic and Paralympic Games. It is a meaningless design of gaudy excess, it is difficult to read, and it portrays our country and our people in the worst possible way. The previous London 2012 branding was better by far - we urge the Prime Minister to encourage the 2012 team to revert the brand to that design.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
